cancelSale().details: Can be called only by the Project admin address.

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.details: Can be called only by the Legion admin address.

params.token: The address of the token to be withdrawn.

params.preLiquidSaleConfig: The period and fee configuration for the pre-liquid sale.

params.proof: The merkle proof that the investor has signed a SAFT
params.saftHash: The hash of the SAFT signed by the investor
params.saftInvestAmount: The amount of capital the investor is allowed to invest, according to the SAFT.
params.tokenAllocationBps: The token allocation the investor will receive as percentage of totalSupply, represented in Basis Points (BPS).

params.allocatedTokenAmount: The allocated token amount for distribution to investors.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token distributed to investors
params.totalSupply: The total supply of the token distributed to investors
params.vestingStartTime: The unix timestamp (seconds) of the block when the vesting starts.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be supplied for distribution.

params.merkleRoot: The merkle root used for investing capital.

updateVestingTerms(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Only callable by Legion, before the token have been supplied by the Project.

params.tokenAllocationOnTGEBps: The token allocation amount released to investors after TGE in BPS (Basis Points).
params.vestingCliffDurationSeconds: The vesting cliff duration for the token sold in seconds.
params.vestingDurationSeconds: The vesting schedule duration for the token sold in seconds.

params.amount: The amount of excess capital to be withdrawn.
params.proof: The merkle proof that the investor has signed a SAFT
params.saftHash: The hash of the SAFT signed by the investor
params.saftInvestAmount: The amount of capital the investor is allowed to invest, according to the SAFT.
params.tokenAllocationBps: The token allocation the investor will receive as percentage of totalSupply, represented in Basis Points (BPS).

withdrawRaisedCapital(address[]).details: Can be called only by the Project admin address.

params.investors: Array of the addresses of the investors' capital which will be withdrawn

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Withdraw tokens from the contract in case of emergency.

initialize((uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Initialized the contract with correct parameters.

invest(uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes32,b.notice: Invest capital to the pre-liquid sale.

publishTgeDetails(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Updates the token details after Token Generation Event (TGE).

refund().notice: Get a refund from the sale during the applicable time window.

releaseTokens().notice: Releases tokens to the investor address.

saleConfig().notice: Returns the configuration for the pre-liquid token sale.

saleStatus().notice: Returns the status of the pre-liquid token sale.

supplyAskTokens(uint256,uint256).notice: Supply tokens for distribution after the Token Generation Event (TGE).

withdrawCapitalIfSaleIsCanceled().notice: Claim back capital from investors if the sale has been canceled.

withdrawExcessCapital(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Withdraw back excess capital from investors.
